title: TypeScript Toolkit Organizational Schema
description: The Organizational JSON Schema for the TypeScript Toolkit.

^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$.title: TypeScript Toolkit Namespace
^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: A Namespace in the TypeScript Toolkit.

description.title: Namespace Description
description.description: A short description of the Toolkit Namespace.

markdownDescription.title: Namespace Markdown Description
markdownDescription.description:
A short description of the Toolkit Namespace that supports Markdown.

If omitted, the description will be used instead.
markdownDescription.markdownDescription:
A short description of the Toolkit Namespace that supports Markdown.

If omitted, the `description` will be used instead.

tools.title: Namespace Tools
tools.description: The Tools in this Toolkit Namespace.

^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$.title: TypeScript Toolkit Tool
^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: A Tool in the TypeScript Toolkit.

description.title: Tool Description
description.description: A short description of the Toolkit Tool.

markdownDescription.title: Tool Markdown Description
markdownDescription.description:
A short description of the Toolkit Tool that supports Markdown.

If omitted, the description will be used instead.
markdownDescription.markdownDescription:
A short description of the Toolkit Tool that supports Markdown.

If omitted, the `description` will be used instead.

exports.title: Tool Exports
exports.description: The TypeScript/JavaScript Members exported by this Toolkit Tool.

^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: A TypeScript/JavaScript Member exported by a Tool in the TypeScript Toolkit.

type.title: Exported Member Type
type.description: The type of the exported member.

description.title: Exported Member Description
description.description: A short description of the Exported TypeScript/JavaScript Member.
